title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Theory of wave optics : propagation, polarization, interference, diffraction, transmission of light through slab and cylindrical waveguides; Optical fiber : types, loss and dispersion characteristics; Sources : LED, gas and semiconductor laser, Low power and high power lasers- pulsed and continuous type; Detectors : photodiodes- PN, PIN and APD, broad band thermal detectors; Modulation techniques: intensity, polarization, interference, electro-optic, electromagnetic : Fiber optic components : couplers, splicer, polarizer; Sensing techniques for displacement, pressure, acceleration, flow, current and voltage measurement; Absorption and fluorescence measurement; Distributed fiber optic sensors- OTDR and OFDR principles; Fiber optic gyroscope; Integrated optics; Nonlinear optics.
